2001.The Fellowship of the Ring (1)  1H 45 min

Is this really the extended version?

@foffster
Sorry I wasn't more clear,
each episode has about 22 minutes long credits (after the end of the movie).
I removed them, not exactly at the point when it finishes  so I left some extra seconds till shows the director's name and main actors and the song ends and begin a new song, so it is not uncomfortable.
See my second comment. About 2.7 GB saved together with the French dub cuts.
So you can call it extended [mkvonly] cut ;-)
Who wants the credits read them at imdb and the music is in the torrent. 
Thx for asking, I admit I should have made it more clear. Cheers

Got a problem here when muxing the files 2002.The Two Towers (1).mkv and 2002.The Two Towers (2).mkv together. I used these two wersions of mkverge: MKVMerge 4.0.0-MKVExtractG and MKVMerge 4.9.1-MKVExtractG

So the problem is when i muxe these two files together i get a grey video(no video, just audio) when the second part begins and till the end...I managed to combine other four parts together with no probs, just these two giving me the trouble. 

Could someone tell me what im doing wrong...:)

@Zacno1
Don't merge them together. They are two different encodes for God's sake. Why make a 3H 30 min form it?
Curious how some people split a 1H 40min movie in two while others want to merge 2 x 1H 45min movies in one.
I'm sure the tool (mkvmerge) showed you a message saying they don't take responsibility for the result. Leave them separate as they are. Safer and easier play back.
